comments.body: plz mujhe one block mincraft me bejh do
Yes, in prehistoric times, bones were indeed burned. This should be added to the game immediately after the nerf of imbalanced skeleton farms that profit from underdeveloped AI.

1. Why is this in the bedrock beta category?

2. you can burn nearly used up weapons and tools in a furnace to get 1 iron nugget (or gold nugget if it was gold)

how about when you burn a tool (ie. iron pick) in a furnace, you get a random number of nuggets rather than just one? it could be anywhere from 1 to 27, each additional nugget being rare-er and rare-er.
My idea is you should create a new bench that can auto craft sorry if it's to hard
My idea is you should create a new bench that can auto craft sorry if it's to hard and it can get items through hoppers
I propose that they add the F3 to Minecraft Bedrock, I also think that the spectator and hardcore game modes are added by default and lastly I propose that they add the oven wagon in Bedrock

Frog lights were originally made because of fireflies glow, since fireflies are poisonous to frogs they changed it to slime. Frog eats slime you get frog light. Its simple that way and I like it simple
I find the idea of frog shells very interesting, it doesn't make much sense for him to eat magma and out of nowhere drop frog light.
